What happens to my VRSCTEST if the token launch fails?

The question assumes that the token launch can fail, but the text actually states that if the token launches, you will either find 0.975 GOLD in your wallet, or you will have your VRSCTEST back. This implies that if the token launch is successful, you will get either GOLD or your VRSCTEST back, but it doesn't mention what happens if the token launch fails.
